class.name: UnityServices
class.brief_description: The [code]UnityServices[/code] Singleton manages the initialization and configuration of Unity Gaming Services (UGS).

method.name: initialize
method.description: Single entry point to initialize all used services.

members.member: The environment to use for Unity Gaming Services. Defaults to [code]production[/code].

signal.name: on_error
signal.description: Emitted when an error occurs during initialization.

signal.name: on_initialized
signal.description: Emitted when Unity Services has tried to initialize.
